full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM RIM BSDUS DON BSHAD LUNG KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE BTZUN BLA MA'I GSUNG BSHAD RAG BSDUS PA'I BRIS SU BKOD PA NGO MTSAR PADMA DKAR PO'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES PA 'DI NI NGES RANG GI KHU BO MKHYEN RAB KYI DBANG PHYUG RGYA NAG MI SNA MKHAN PO TSA BA YONGS 'DZIN SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, RJE BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN POS MNYES BZHIN RJES SU BZUNG BA YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO'I MING CAN GYI RANG LO'I NYI SHU PA LA BRIS PA YIN PAS DAG MIN GYI DPYAD PA NI MKHAS PA CHEN PO RNAMS PHYOGS 'DIR CUNG ZAD 'DRIS PA RNAMS KYI MDZAD DGOS YOD DO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,
